transArray.content: The room is clean and the staff is friendly. It is an orange hotel that provides real oranges for free, as well as Coke and Sprite. Nongfu Spring is provided free of charge.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhang Minghui
